intro: Reichantha, commonly known as the slender reichantha, is a genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Apiaceae. These plants are characterized by their slender, often hairy stems and small, clustered flowers. They typically grow in temperate regions and are often found in moist, shaded environments. Reichantha species are known for their aromatic leaves and are sometimes used in traditional herbal medicine. The genus includes several species, each with slight variations in leaf shape and flowering patterns.
